properties.name: app.keycloak.port
properties.description: Specifies the port number on which the Keycloak server is running.

properties.name: app.keycloak.base-url
properties.description: Defines the base URL of the Keycloak server, excluding the port.

properties.name: app.keycloak.username
properties.description: The administrative username used to authenticate with the Keycloak server.

properties.name: app.keycloak.password
properties.description: The password for the administrative Keycloak user.

properties.name: app.keycloak.realm
properties.description: The name of the Keycloak realm to be used by the application.

properties.name: app.keycloak.admin-client
properties.description: The client ID of the Keycloak admin client used for administrative operations.

properties.name: app.keycloak.client
properties.description: The client ID of the Keycloak client used for user authentication.

properties.name: app.domain
properties.description: The domain name where the application is hosted.

properties.name: app.ssl
properties.description: Indicates whether SSL is enabled (true/false) for the application.

properties.name: app.minio.endpoint
properties.description: The endpoint URL for connecting to the MinIO server.

properties.name: app.minio.access-key
properties.description: The access key used to authenticate with the MinIO server.

properties.name: app.minio.secret-key
properties.description: The secret key used to authenticate with the MinIO server.

properties.name: app.minio.bucket-name
properties.description: The name of the MinIO bucket used for storing files.

properties.name: app.minio.exposed-port-api
properties.description: The externally exposed port for the MinIO API service.
